Author: kind
Title: Unitycoin,the first coin backed by an international websites networks.
Body: The first time I heard about this project, I thought it was another lending program. But after reading the white paper, I see that Unitycoin is not a speculative project with no intrinsic value like many crypto's currently on the market. It is an innovative project that, in my opinion, presents an excellent development and investment opportunity.

Author: Unity-Coin
Title: Unitycoin,the first coin backed by an international websites networks.
Body: Unitycoin is a utility token developed with Erc20 protocol on top of Ethereum Blockchain UNT is hisTiker on the markets. Our total supply is 100,000,000 UNT  Unitycoin is backed by a free digital opportunities network . This developing network in his web MVP form is consisting of service platforms for active members and a websites network administered by franchisees. We are currently working to develop our different business models in the form of a DAPP marketplace.  Unitycoin is for active members, franchisees, entreprises and advertisers  Active Members: You are able to generate online income without investment by performing simple digital marketing tasks. You are paid in UNT and USD according to the tasks performed.  Franchisees: You are able to launch your digital project for free with the support of our technical team. The development of your project will be supported by the active members of our community. Different sources of monetization are already available for all new franchisees  Entreprises : Our marketing agency offers a set of digital services, one of these is tokenization of your business on the Blockchain. We offer you to launch your own token to value and maximize the potential of your business.  Advertisers: Our active membership network and our media network of a variety of websites are opportunities for our advertising partners to showcase your products and services  All holders of Unitycoin can sell UNT on crypto-currency exchange platforms or hold them while they gain their value. We are currently completing our 5M presale at $ 0.01. 10 M UNT will be sold from 01-04-2018 on the main decentralized exchanges at $ 0.10 to complete our first financing round This round of funding aims to accelerate the development of our digital opportunities network. A Google form for all collaborators and active members is available on our different groups to enable you to join our community and thus receive your UNT. Our growth forecasts set the price of UNT at $ 1.00 within 12 months and $10.00 in the next 5 years.  Looking forward to seeing you among us

Author: Unity-Coin
Title: Unitycoin,the first coin backed by an international websites networks.
Body: Unitycoin,the first coin backed by an international websites networks.  WEB SITE :http://unityco.in/ WHITE PAPER :http://unityco.in/white-papper/ REDDIT :https://www.reddit.com/user/Unity-Coin/   We introduce to the crypto community a new Altcoin in the digital marketing industry. It's an optimized tool for anyone wishing to generate online income , for any company looking for new customers and for all advertisers who want to increase the performance of her advertising campaigns.  This new Token use the Ethereum ERC-20 protocol and will be use as an exchange and remuneration tool for all services generated on our decentralized digital network. Unitycoin is based on real activities established for several years in the field of digital marketing and online opportunities. Its relevance is based on an active community and an international network of websites relating to a multitude of economic sectors. We work on the Blockchain to guarantee any immutability of our trade and guarantee our actions by smart contract. Unitycoin aims to make digital marketing transparent, efficient and responsive to the needs of our different target markets.  UPDATES  [DEC. 8 2017] Unitycoin Website is online! http://unityco.in/  [JAN.15 2018] Hello everyone We are officially in presale the Pre-sale price of UNT is $ 0.005  All UNT sold in pre-sale stage will be distribute first day of ICO The ICO stage will begin on 15-02-2018 Following the airdrop development team UNT price in  ICO start at 0.01$ USD + 0.01 $USD  each million sold UNitycoin to be available on Cryptopia after 5,000,000 UNT UNT will be sold on Itradecoin.ca  at 0.10 $ on March 31, 2018  During the presale period, the development team accelerates the work.   Several new projects online each week with very committed admins, the development of our service platforms is going very well,  White paper, websites and promo kit  will be updated before ICO Launch We continue to recruit the development and admin team to support our current growth. Thank you for using the google form to send to your contacts who might be interested in developing with us. /forms/Y2ivXPXORkQlb5uJ3]https://[Suspicious link removed]/forms/Y2ivXPXORkQlb5uJ3   Have a nice week everyones Stay  tune for updates this week  [FEB.05 2018] First live support EtherDelta crypto trading plateform   Our Pre-sale is live ðŸš€ 20x for early contributors Free digital marketing network increase your online incomes for Individuals, Entreprise and Advertisers. Proven business model since 2010 Multiple revenue streams and dedicated exchange âœ…  Visit our website and read whitepaper for more details.  https://unityco.in/paypal-order/   HISTORIC  Unitycoin are developed by our Canadian-based digital marketing agency. We have been active since 2010 in the market of online opportunities and digital marketing. Our agency develops several dynamic platforms under PHP and a network of static websites under the WordPress CMS. We are the head of a Web site network in both the Canadian and international markets. Our website folio is presented in the '' Established website '' and '' Developing Platform '' section of this white paper.   Our initial business model is based on relational marketing and online advertising. Our focus is to connect clients in search of business services in their area. At the same time we have developed expertise for supplying digital services and tools to help our partners-entrepreneurs to develop their consumer base. We are really grateful for the great visibility and return bring by affiliate marketing and search engines. Our digital service offer are presented in the section: '' Services for Businesses ''   Our first mission has subsequently evolved according to our goal to represent all individuals who want to generate online income solutions that are easy to use and adapted to their needs. We have therefore developed a complete set of tools ready to use for all individuals. We named it the '' digital franchises ''. The purpose of this business model is to provide comprehensive solutions to individuals who want to start their own business and make money online.   In parallel with the launch of Unitycoin, our first digital currency, we are preparing the launch of our own development agency on the Blockchain which will be presented at the beginning of January 2018 when unveiling the white paper. As part of this new project we are working on several innovative concepts in different sectors of activity who can be radically transform or enhanced by the use of the Blockchain technology.   DIGITAL SOLUTIONS FOR OUR TARGET MARKETS  SERVICES OFFER FOR ACTIVE MEMBERS  Our offer of services for active members consists mainly of two objectives 1-Provide multiple sources of revenue online by offering digital opportunities  2-Provide training to enable active members to increase their performance   1 ACTIVE MEMBER INCOME SOURCES  The holders of a layoff are administrators of static websites under WordPress They are aimed at beginners who manage their first website. Franchisees, for their part, are more experienced administrators who manage a dynamic platform under PHP  In both situations you are members of the Unitycoin network and benefit from the work and support of an active community to develop your project.   LAUNCH YOUR DIGITALLY-LICENSED STATIC OR TRANSACTIONAL WEB SITE  As soon as it launches your static Web site will generate shared advertising revenue through the centralized Adsense account and other advertisers. The more pages you add, the more revenue you generate. Your website is now part of the network of Web sites affiliated to Unitycoin and receives visitors from the community. Be members of the network allow you to earn advertising revenue by browsing and the complete actions on your website. One of your main functions is to edit text-to-photo and video content. As you web site expands its content, its number of pages online, its number of page referenced on the search engines increases. Your website will therefore become your main tool for developing your network in your target market in order to direct your future prospects in the funnel of automated digital marketing conversion. It is the future members who will apply the same strategies, allowing you to generate affiliate revenues on their online activities.   FOUNDER  JÃ©suel Albernhe  https://www.linkedin.com/in/j%C3%A9suel-albernhe-0463031a/  https://www.facebook.com/jesuel.albernhe.7?fref=ts   Anatole Planteur  https://www.linkedin.com/in/anatole-planteur-64723851/  https://www.facebook.com/anatole.planteur?fref=ts   Nathalie Pelletier  https://www.linkedin.com/in/nathalie-pelletier-6ba75697/  https://www.facebook.com/nathalie.pelletier3?fref=ts    T E C H N I C A L  D E TA I L S   Unitycoin es a Token Ethereum under the ERC-20 protocol Contract Address: 0x865a074B77D04A6a04Be3Ac1ba41a089C315551B Token Ticker: UNT Decimals: 18  Total Supply: 100 million (100 million)  No new token will be created 75 000 000 will be distributed to the community 25 000 000 will be available to investors  Tokens not sold at the ICO will be retained by the Unitycoin Foundation and will be gradually made available on the exchange market in order to ensure the liquidity necessary for the development of the franchised Web site network.  The aim of the token emission is to exchange internally the network through different digital services, in no way constitute a financial product.   LICENSEE  As a licensee on the Unitycoin network you will be the administrator of a static web site or a dynamic platform, so you will have to perform daily tasks. These actions will have as objectives to contribute to the development of the notoriety of your site and the network by it's own. By working with the development teams and in collaboration with other members of the network, you will contribute to valuing Unitycoin and your coin portfolio at once. As an administrator you will need on a regular basis to write original and relevant content in connection with the business area of your site. If you are not an experienced editor the trainers of the management team will guide you in writing articles. These informative or promotional articles that you will publish on your site at the first time must be shared on different interest groups on the main social networks in order to direct visitors to your site  Sharing on these different groups and social networks will increase the number of visits to your site, promoting will increase advertising revenues of the network. In addition, if you are selling consulting services packages as a consultant, your regular appearance on the social network will provide you with a status of reference and increase your opportunities for customer development and income. Content writing and the presence on social networks are the best guarantees for the success of the development of your online business
